p:
Yields and coefficients were determined according to Carota et al. [ 17] and Mitra et al. [ 16], with small modifications. The biomass yield was expressed as grams of dry biomass per liter of HWP (g/L). Lipid yield (∆P) was calculated according to Eq. ( 1) (g/L):
1

Δ P = Δ X ∗
